data.name: Sex Chess
data.detailed_description:
It is said that the Satan is the rightful Ruler of Hell, but even here he will have to fend off the annoying "forces of Good with BIG swords" that want to free all of the sinners from his underground dungeon. Take on the role of a hellish BDSM practitioner, the Devil's most important henchman, and crush the leader of the Light Forces in a six round duel on the chessboard. Use your intellect and cunning to show the brazen liberators their place.



Features:
- Lots of unique hot and juicy sex scenes between figures;
- You don't need physical strength to win, but you'll need to be smart and calculating. Don't let the witty remarks of your opponent confuse you;
- Live chess pieces. The creatures of Light are as alluring as the hos sinners. Your chess matches will turn into phantasmagoric, mind-blowing art house parties;
- Magical abilities. The Devil wouldn't be called that if he didn't always have a trick up his sleeve. A bunch of new rules will give you an advantage over your opponent, but only before she notices he's being deceived;
- Online Multiplayer! Call your friends to enjoy some hardcore action on the chess board together!

data.short_description: Hell is about to get invaded and the sinners trapped inside are about to be freed. But the clueless liberators had no idea how cunning the Devil is. This time, the war between Light and Darkness will be waged not on the battlefield, but on a chess board.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz (2 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card

content_descriptors.notes: Nude characters, sex scenes, and crude speech.
